text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly states under the 'QUICK FACT-CHECK' table that copyright subsists automatically in Italy under 'Art. 2-c of the Italian Copyright Law \u2013 L. 633/1941'. Furthermore, Section 2, 'LEGAL FRAMEWORK IN ITALY,' lists 'Italian Law 633/1941 (as amended)' as the key statute for Copyright protection. This directly satisfies the criterion requiring the response to state that in Italy, there is typically copyright protection for a cartoon character as a 'work of art' (implied by the protection afforded to the original work under L. 633/1941).", "criterion_id": "f0b46aed-a4a4-4c6a-8145-a71c5131877f"}
